Both traditional & advanced #recycling can contribute significantly to a circular economy by repurposing plastics. New mechanical recycling is capturing more types of plastic waste, while advanced recycling can capture plastics not widely recycled today. - @AmChemistry

Advanced #recycling refers to chemically breaking down plastic waste into a basic form. What you get is a purified material that can be used for an array of products, including new plastic items or fuels.

Mechanical #recycling tech breaks and keeps plastic in it's original form--that is, plastic waste is sorted & broken down to create more plastic products.
